select id , name , phone , subject_name as "subject" from member m left join subject s on(m.subject = s.subject_no) where m.status = 'Y' and sort = 2 and subject is not null order by subject
select id , name , phone from member m where m.status = 'Y' and sort = 2 and subject is null
mapper.update: update member set status='N' where id = #{id} and sort = 2

select id , name , s.subject_name as "subject" , round((a.count / (m.end_date - m.start_date)) * 100, 1) as "attendance_rate" , m.status as "status" , s.class_no from member m join attendance a using(id) join subject s on (m.subject = s.subject_no) where sort = 3 and (m.status = 'Y' or m.status = 'A') and s.class_no = 1 order by m.status
